name: Morok
description: Morok is a visual novel with northern mood. Imagine: you woke up in a swamp. Gnats are swarming all around you. A creepy old woman invites you to her hut. The plot of the game Morok takes us to a small russian village. Everyone knows you, but you don't recognize anybody. The player will go a path to figure out exactly what happened in this place and who they really are.
